session.tapToStart: Tap the button above to start your first conversation.
session.yoloModeDescription: Auto-approve all tool calls (use with caution)

selectProject.title: Select a Project
selectProject.message: Tap the Open button in the header to select a project folder.

autoConnect.title: Auto Connect
autoConnect.description: Automatically connect to server on startup

autoCleanEmptySessions.title: Auto Clean Empty Sessions
autoCleanEmptySessions.description: Automatically delete sessions with no agent response

hideHiddenFiles.title: Hide Hidden Files
hideHiddenFiles.description: Hide files and folders starting with dot (.)

serverConnection.title: Server Connection
serverConnection.scanToConnect: Scan to connect from another device
serverConnection.scanQrCodeHint: Point your camera at a QR code to scan the WebSocket URL
serverConnection.noCameraFound: No camera found on this device
serverConnection.cameraAccessDenied: Camera access denied. Please allow camera access in your browser settings.

agent.title: Agent Connection
agent.description: Manage the connection to the AI coding agent.
agent.info: The agent runs as a subprocess and communicates via the Agent Client Protocol (ACP). Currently using claude-code-acp adapter.

model.title: Model Configuration
model.description: View and switch AI models for the current session.
model.connectToView: Connect to the agent to view available models.
model.createSession: Create or select a session to view available models.
model.fetchingModels: Fetching available models from the agent...
model.aboutDescription: Available models depend on your agent config and API keys. Switching only affects the current session.

modelProvider.title: Model Provider
modelProvider.description: Configure the AI model provider used by the agent. Changing provider requires restarting the agent.
modelProvider.defaultDescription: Uses environment variables from system or shell
modelProvider.restartDescription: Changes to model provider settings will take effect after restarting the agent connection.
modelProvider.ollamaModelHint: Enter the model name from your Ollama server (e.g., qwen3:32b, llama3.3)
modelProvider.ollamaDescription: Ollama provides local LLM inference. Default URL: http://localhost:11434
modelProvider.openrouterModelHint: Enter the model ID from OpenRouter (e.g., anthropic/claude-sonnet-4.5)
modelProvider.openrouterTokenHint: Your OpenRouter API key (starts with sk-or-)

mcpSettings.title: MCP Servers
mcpSettings.description: Configure Model Context Protocol servers in ~/.claude.json
mcpSettings.connectToManage: Connect to the agent to manage MCP servers
mcpSettings.noServersDescription: Add MCP servers to extend the agent with custom tools and resources.

pluginSettings.title: Plugins
pluginSettings.addMarketplaceDescription: Add a new plugin marketplace by providing its Git repository URL.
pluginSettings.marketplaceDisabled: Marketplace is disabled. Enable it to manage plugins.
pluginSettings.noPluginsAvailable: No plugins available in this marketplace

permissionSettings.title: Permission Rules
permissionSettings.description: Configure automatic permission rules for tool calls.
permissionSettings.connectToManage: Connect to the agent to manage permission rules
permissionSettings.noRulesDescription: Add rules to automatically allow or deny tool calls.
permissionSettings.rulePriorityDescription: Rules are evaluated top to bottom. First match wins.

chat.typeMessage: Type a message below to begin
chat.connectToChat: Connect to an agent to start chatting...

files.title: Files
files.selectProject: Select a project to browse files

editor.unsavedChangesDescription: This file has unsaved changes. Do you want to save before closing?

projectSelector.title: Open Project
projectSelector.getStarted: Enter a path above to get started
projectSelector.connectFirst: Connect to server first to browse

connection.setupDescription: Connect to an AeroWork server to start
connection.setupHint: Enter the WebSocket URL from your AeroWork desktop app, or scan the QR code
connection.localServerDetectedDescription: Connection failed, but a local server was found on the default port. Would you like to connect to it?
